projects.title: Dakota's On The Cove
projects.description: This is a custom built and designed website, worked on collaboratively with designers and project managers for a restaurant based in The Bronx, New York.

projects.title: The Froth Cafe
projects.description: The Froth Cafe is a mock cafe website that allows users to browse menus, place orders, and create accounts.

projects.alt: Global Accessibility Awareness Day website screenshot
projects.title: Ongoing: Global Accessibility Awareness Day
projects.description: Assiting in the migration of the Global Accessibility Awareness Day website from WordPress to NextJS.

projects.title: Thrifty Pet
projects.description: This app tracks Chewy product prices overtime to show their lowest, highest, and average prices. Users can add, edit, and delete notes. (Current prices are not up to date - cron job that was scheduled to scrape the data daily is commented out.)
